title: Understanding Entropy Change in Sublimation
text: When a solid substance, like iodine crystals, is converted into gas, the molecules have more freedom to move. Will this increase or decrease the disorder of the system?

title: Compare States of Matter
text: Entropy is often linked with the orderliness of a system. Consider how ordered a solid structure is compared to a gas. Which one has more disorder?

title: Relate Movement and Entropy
text: In the case of gas molecules, they tend to move around more freely and occupy a larger volume than in a solid. What does this tell us about the entropy change going from solid to gas?

title: Determine the Entropy Change
text: Given that gases generally have more disorder than solids, predict the entropy change when iodine crystals sublimate into gas.
